        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Words and Letters</string>
            <string language="es">Palabras y letras</string>
            <string language="ga">Focail agus Litreacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wörter und Zeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots et lettres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavras e letras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole e lettere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέξεις και επιστολές</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Test your knowledge of words and letters.</string>
            <string language="es">Comprueba tus conocimientos de las palabras y las letras.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástáil d’eolas ar fhocail agus litreacha.</string>
          </description>

          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfen Sie Ihr Wissen von Wörtern und von 
Zeichen.</string>
          </description>

lettres.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Verifichi la vostra conoscenza delle parole e 
delle lettere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
